See some of my works here; I'm glad to have been a member of this project: The first edition of the series of books on Iranian fashion designers, managed by the International SAFPEM Institute, has been officially published. This edition introduces the designs and creations of forty-five Iranian designers and brands from around the world. The Fashion Designers Chain Book project aims to create an archive of the works and ideas of Iranian avant-garde designers in fashion, systematically and consistently presenting them to enthusiasts worldwide. The French-English publisher, STORIA Editions, is responsible for the global distribution of this project. A physical copy of the book is available for purchase worldwide through the international platform Amazon.ูุฎุณุชู ุดูุงุฑู ุงุฒ ุณุฑ ฺฉุชุงุจโูุง ุทุฑุงุญุงู ุงุฑุงู ุญูุฒู ูุดู ุจุง ูุฏุฑุช ุงูุณุชุชู ุจูโุงูููู SAFPEM ุจุตูุฑุช ุฑุณู ููุชุดุฑ ุดุฏ. ุฏุฑ ุงู ุดูุงุฑูุ ุทุฑุญโูุง ู ุชููุฏุงุช ฺูู ู ูพูุฌ ุทุฑุงุญ ู ุจุฑูุฏ ุงุฑุงู ุงุฒ ุณุฑุงุณุฑ ุฌูุงู ููุฑุฏ ูุนุฑู ูุฑุงุฑ ฺฏุฑูุชู ุงุณุช. ูพุฑูฺู ฺฉุชุงุจโูุง ุฒูุฌุฑูโุง ุทุฑุงุญุงู ูุดูุ ุชูุงุด ุฏุงุฑุฏ ฺฉู ุชุง ุญุฏ ุงูฺฉุงูุ ุขุฑุดู ุงุฒ ุขุซุงุฑ ู ุงุฏูโูุง ุทุฑุงุญุงู ููฺฏุฑุง ุงุฑุงู ุฑุง ุฏุฑ ูุฏูู ูุดู ุจุทูุฑ ูุฏูู ู ููุธู ุจู ุนูุงููโููุฏุงู ุณุฑุงุณุฑ ุฌูุงู ูุนุฑู ููุงุฏ.ุงูุชุดุงุฑุงุช ูุฑุงูุณู-ุงูฺฏูุณ STORIA Editions ูุณุฆููุช ุงูุชุดุงุฑ ุฌูุงู ุงู ูพุฑูฺู ุฑุง ุจุฑ ุนูุฏู ุฏุงุฑุฏ. ููููู ูุฒฺฉ ฺฉุชุงุจ ุงุฒ ุทุฑู ูพูุชูุฑู ุจูโุงูููู ุขูุงุฒูู ุฏุฑ ุณุฑุงุณุฑ ุฌูุงู ูุงุจู ุชูู ู ุฏุฑ ุฏุณุชุฑุณ ุนูุงููโููุฏุงู ูโุจุงุดุฏ.hashtag#safpemfashionbook hashtag#safpeminstitute hashtag#storiaeditions hashtag#safpem hashtag#bookproject hashtag#storia hashtag#safpembooks hashtag#fmica hashtag#fmicaorganizers hashtag#iranianfashiondesigners hashtag#iranianfashion hashtag#iranianaidesigners hashtag#ai hashtag#fashion hashtag#fashiondesign hashtag#aifashion hashtag#contemporaryaidesign hashtag#aiconceptor hashtag#safpem_ai_department hashtag#safpem_newmediahashtag#ฺฉุชุงุจ_ุทุฑุงุญุงู_ูุดู hashtag#ูุดู hashtag#ฺฉุชุงุจูุง_ุณููพู hashtag#ุณููพู hashtag#ุทุฑุงุญ_ูุนุงุตุฑ hashtag#ุทุฑุงุญุงู_ุงุฑุงู

the Dorsa BrandIt might be interesting to know that each frame of this photo collection took more than 3 hours, Consider that we are talking about a team of 6 people.It might also be interesting to know that each photo consists of about 20 different photographs or even more.And each one them in the post-production section took more than 7-8 hours and even more.This project was full of challenges and of course love.We would have spent the same amount of time if we were working for the most famous fashion brands in the world.๐ก I donโt think it matters what brand you work with, what you do for each brand can determine the value of a collaboration.Thank you to the whole team who were very friendly and supportive with usDORSA company DORSA Team:โCreative Director: Shahin Fatemi Marketing Manager: Reza Chamani Fashion Executive CD: AmirAli FatemiโArt Director: Elika Shahverdi Photography Team ๐ธ:Art Director & Project Manager:Farbod Jafarpour  Photography&Lighting: Farbod
